attributes.action: Have a UK wide referendum on whether Scotland should be part of the UK
attributes.background: In the commons today 3/10/19 the SNP stated that "he (Boris) would never have the consent of Scotland" on any Brexit deal. Scotland voted to remain and want another referendum, let us give them one..a UK wide referendum on whether we want them in the UK.... let them have their independence!

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It is for the people of Scotland to decide their future.
